attributes.action: Ensure the UK Parliament returns from summer recess in this time of crisis
attributes.additional_details: Ordinary UK citizens are suffering due to Covid 19 and some sectors have very little help.  Many people cannot afford a break or are in fear of future employment.  This sets a bad example and further distances politicians from people and their constituents.
attributes.background:
I want them to be available to respond
and steer the UK through these unprecedented times.  We need strong leadership and debate now!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332743
